title: Colonoscopy Preparation Education: Mobile App-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and general understanding of digestive system structures
context.additional_context: Blended Education Course in a Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environment, Combining Theoretical Learning and Practical Simulations via Mobile App-Based Instruction, Optimized for Large Learner Groups

learning_goals: Learners can explain step-by-step procedures for bowel preparation before colonoscopy with ≥90% accuracy.
Learners can plan and adhere to 100% of bowel preparation medication timelines via mobile app simulation.
Learners can apply dietary guidelines and precautions during the preparation process with ≥85% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
